CustomField.formula: OR( AND( TAG_Age__c >=30, ISPICKVAL(InclusionStage__c, "Ny henvendelse") ), AND( TAG_Age__c >=30, OR( ISPICKVAL(InclusionStage__c, "Avklaring"), ISPICKVAL(InclusionStage__c, "Ferdig Avklart") ), AND( OR( ISBLANK(TAG_Employer_Last_Activity_Date__c), TAG_Employer_Last_Activity_Date__c + 30 < TODAY() ), OR( ISBLANK(LastActivityDate), LastActivityDate + 30 < TODAY() ) ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(InclusionStage__c, "Avsluttet"), DATEVALUE(TAG_Resolved_Date_Time__c) < TAG_Employer_Last_Activity_Date__c+30 ) )
CustomField.label: Quality Issue: Timeliness
